meanings.definition: A card with a magnetic strip or embedded microchip used to gain access to a building or room.
meanings.sent1: I swiped my keycard to enter the office building.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to always carry your keycard to unlock the door.
meanings.sent3: The keycard beeped happily as it granted me entry.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the keycard that unlocked his heart.
meanings.sent5: The keycard glowed with power as it granted access to the secret room.

meanings.definition: A card used to activate or operate a machine or device.
meanings.sent1: Insert the keycard to start the vending machine.
meanings.sent2: The technician used the keycard to power up the equipment.
meanings.sent3: The keycard danced in the slot, eager to be used.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the keycard that activated his potential.
meanings.sent5: With a swipe of the keycard, the robot sprang to life.
